parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its hit part index). All hit points can be obtained with [[getAllHitPointsDamage]] command.
* 0: no damage
* 1: full damage

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setHitIndex''' [hitPartIndex, damage, useEffects]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be damaged

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> hitPartIndex: [[Number]] - hit part index of the Hit Point

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> damage: [[Number]] - level of damage

</value></part><part><name>p4 </name>=<value> useEffects: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[true]]) [[false]] to skip destruction effects. <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setHitIndex]] [1, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setHitIndex]] [7, 0.5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getAllHitPointsDamage]], [[getHitIndex]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHitPointDamage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]]
</value></part></template></root>
